## Course Organizer


2019. Coordinated 2nd Training Workshop on Modelling and Outbreak Analysis, Bogotá, Colombia. 45 participants from 6 Latin American countries (June 2019). [Outbreak Course 2019](www.ins.gov.co/modelamiento/modelamiento.html )

2017. Coordinated 1st Training Workshop on Modelling and Outbreak Analysis, Bogotá, Colombia. 45 participants from 2 Latin American countries (December 2018) [Outbreaks Course 2017](https://epicoursebogota.netlify.app/ )

2018. Coordinated International Modelling Chagas Workshop (30 participants form 7 different countries) Imperial College London, February 2018.
